title: shAradE pAhimAm
sahitya:
shAradE pAhimAm sarOruha nibhapradE sArasAkSa shrI vAsudEva karuNAnvitE varadE


anupallavi

  nIrajAsana jAyE nikhila vidyApradE nAradAdi sakala muni vinutE suradE


caraNam    cAru vINAdi su-shObhitakarE hIramaNi hAra lasita kandarE
 vArNEndra gamanE nata sura nikarE vArijAkSaNa rucira bimbadharE
